data.title: Not as nice as I'd hoped
data.text: I took my son here when he was 1 1/2 years old.  There weren't as many activities for him to play, and it didn't feel very clean or well maintained.  I'm a bit spoiled because the Children's Museum in Austin is so amazing.

data.title: Cute place not sure if we will go back
data.text: I took my four younger children there.  They had a fun time playing with the grocery store, vet clinic, etc.  Not sure if I will be going back because it is kind of expensive and a lot smaller than other children museums, but fun to try.

data.title: Great Place to take the kids on a hot day
data.text: Price is not unreasonable.  Plenty of fun things to do if you actually engage with the children while there.  My two boys love this place. We go here when it's too hot to go to the park.

data.title: Kids like it
data.text: Kids enjoy the center, but it is pricey! There is a cost for adults too. All there is for the adults is chairs to sit in.

data.title: Great place to beat the summer heat!
data.text: I brought the kids by when it was 100 outside.  The kids loved playing various learning games.  The staff was great and welcomed us immediately.  We look forward to returning to see the new exhibits.
